snippet: A former manager of a Singapore-based company accused of defrauding the Navy out of millions of dollars has pleaded guilty in the case.
abstract: Alex Wisidagama, former manager of Singapore-based company Glenn Defense Marine Asia, which is accused of defrauding Navy out of millions of dollars, pleads guilty in case.
lead_paragraph: A former manager of a Singapore-based company accused of defrauding the Navy out of millions of dollars has pleaded guilty in the case.

headline.main: California: Guilty Plea in Navy Fraud Case
